overview: Within an historical context of globalization and technological changes, 'Extremes' deliberates about the sociability between the occidental human race, original inhabitants, machines and nature. Development that move forward, blow away, accumulate, mix over, merge and dispose. Audiovisual poem which go through urbanity and natural environment by the combination of past and present time, native ceremonies and contemporary behaviors; spirit and matter. An invitation to think over that, in the end, we are all one.
title: Extremos: Viaje a Karukinka
